amendment.description: To strike section 306, relating to a repeal of the limitation on the length of service as a member of the Select Committee on Intelligence of the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4059 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4059 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S11271; text: CR S11271) To strike section 306, relating to a repeal of the limitation on the length of service as a member of the Select Committee on Intelligence of the Senate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4059 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4059 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
